function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of high fidelity mobile holographic capability may lead to increased physical interaction and close proximity among individuals, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Unmitigated use of this technology could contribute to the transmission of contagious diseases and increase the risk of outbreaks in urban areas.","Mitigation":"Limiting physical interaction by using remote collaboration tools and promoting hygiene and social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, virtual reality meeting platforms, advanced teleconferencing systems.","People":"Citizens, stakeholders, urban planners, government officials.","Owner":"Government, technology companies, urban planning organizations."},{"Description":"Integration of AI and Big Data in creating super datasets for urban fabrics may lead to data privacy and security risks, potentially exposing sensitive information to unauthorized individuals or entities.","Impact":"Unprotected data could lead to privacy breaches, identity theft, and misuse of personal information, leading to loss of public trust in smart city initiatives.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data security measures, encryption protocols, and strict access controls to safeguard sensitive information.","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, secure authentication systems, access control mechanisms.","People":"Citizens, city administrators, data management professionals.","Owner":"Government, data management companies, cybersecurity experts."}]}
